resources.string: select PK_ID, NAME, CHINESE_NAME, CODE, null from MERIDIAN_CHANNEL order by CODE, NAME
select PK_ID, NAME, CHINESE_NAME, CODE, ALIAS from ACUPOINT order by CODE, NAME
select PK_ID, NAME, CHINESE_NAME, CODE, ALIAS from ACUPOINT where CHANNEL_ID = ? order by ORDER_NUM
select A.PICTURE, A.NAME, A.CHINESE_NAME, A.CODE, A.ALIAS, M.PICTURE, A.DESCRIPTION, A.DESCRIPTION_ZH from ACUPOINT A, MERIDIAN_CHANNEL M where A.PK_ID = ? and M.PK_ID = A.CHANNEL_ID
